channel.title: Need help getting files from client
channel.description: Ok so I have talked to the owners of a server and they agreed to let me use all of their customs as long as they are credited.. But the catch is I have to get the models and class8 from their client, they won't just transfer the files to me. Can someone help me get those files? I have tv if you think it will be easier to help me that way. Here is the download link for the client so that it is easier for you to help me. http://www.mediafire.com/?2csb2a8ri7usfuq

item.title: Need help getting files from client
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:10, topic:425675”]This is a week old, but I need to say this.

I never gave you permission to do this, so stop lying.
The class files are named strangely because I obbed them before releasing, so leechers like you would have a slightly harder time decompiling the client. lol.

Also, of course you have to run Jad with arguments. (duh)

Nerdaz, obviously the models are packed in a file somewhere… can you find it? It’s easy

Don’t bother.[/quote]

Oh, tht explains alot. …srry for messing with ur client.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting files from client

item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

i kno. i tried to get them for you. the ints are obviously in Class 8. but its all A, B, C, D …etc .Class files…i would just email the owner, and ask him to giv u a text copy of the class 8.

item.title: Need help getting files from client
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

The cmd on my jad opens up, then just closes and nothing happens.
Ive spent the last 6 hours working on this and got nowhere.
I can’t find where the ints are at for the customs.
I also need the models. That the big thing.

Read full topic

[EDIT]: I decompiled it, but only got the .class files…maby u should just ask Project Rainbow to giv u a .zip of their source, instead of extracting it from the client…

item.title: Need help getting files from client
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

Ok so I have talked to the owners of a server and they agreed to let me use all of their customs as long as they are credited…
But the catch is I have to get the models and class8 from their client, they won’t just transfer the files to me.
Can someone help me get those files?
I have tv if you think it will be easier to help me that way.
Here is the download link for the client so that it is easier for you to help me.

MediaFire

Project Rainbow [4.1].zip

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.
